paths.description: List of directories that contain images

path.description: A directory that contains images to choose from when changing the background image.

alignment.description: The image alignment in Windows Terminal. Default is center.

opacity.description: The opacity of background images in Windows Terminal. Default is 1.0.

stretch.description: The image stretch option in Windows Terminal. Default is uniformToFill.

port.description: The port used by the tbg server to send POST requests to trigger actions such as changing the background image or quitting the server. Default is 9545.

profile.description: The profile used in Windows Terminal. It can be referenced by index (starting at 1) or by profile name (e.g., 'pwsh'). Default is 'default'.

interval.description: The time in minutes between each image change. Default is 30 minutes.
